scenario.title: Solution must returns properly sorted collection

examples.step: When sort this collection ordered by '<orderBy>'
Then the sorted collection should be equals to '<sortedList>'
Given a collection '[9,3,1,65]'com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Expected BEGIN_ARRAY but was STRING at line 1 column 8 path $.list
When sort this collection ordered by 'ASC'
Then the sorted collection should be equals to '[1,3,9,65]'
